Account Officer Job at Fort Knox Outsourcing




        
    

        
        Fort Knox Outsourcing is poised to serve the growing needs of businesses in Nigeria. By helping them to reap the economic, strategic and operational benefits offered by outsourcing. We act as a “Third Party Service Provider” that sources, selects, and Second employment ready workforce in line with client specifications to meet their talent needs as quickly as possible.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Officer
Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Manage and grow a portfolio of existing clients while identifying new business opportunities.
	Build and maintain strong, long-term client relationships.
	Understand client needs and propose suitable products or services.
	Prepare and deliver presentations, proposals, and sales reports.
	Negotiate contracts and close deals in line with company objectives.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless service delivery.
	Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback.
	Achieve and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or a related field.
	3–5 years of proven experience as an Account Executive or in a similar sales/client-facing role.
	Strong communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.
	Excellent presentation and relationship management abilities.
	Ability to work independently and meet targets.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint); CRM experience is an added advantage.


Salary
N350,000 per month.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@fortknoxoutsourcing.com using "Account Executive Application" as the subject of the mail.

	WATT Renewable Corporation is seeking a full-time, on-site Accountant in Lagos.

	Manage end-to-end accounting including AR, AP, GL, and reconciliations

	Monitor cash flow, bank balances, and payment schedules

	Ensure statutory compliance (taxes, filings, audits)
	Maintain strong internal controls and documentation
	Support external audits and regulatory reviews


Reporting &amp; Insight:


	Track expenses, revenues, and cost allocations
	Support budgeting and forecast processes
	Provide clear financial insight to management


Systems &amp; Discipline:


	Maintain accurate records within accounting systems
	Ensure data integrity and timely financial close


Skills &amp; Experience


	5&ndash;8 years of accounting experience
	ACA or ACCA qualification (required or near completion)
	Experience operating as a sole accountant
	Infrastructure, telecom, or asset-heavy environment experience preferred


Cultural Markers:


	Detail-oriented, disciplined, and accountable
	Comfortable owning the full finance function
	Calm under reporting deadlines

	Clean audit outcomes and regulatory compliance
	Clear visibility into cash flow, receivables, and payables


Core Responsibilities
Financial Operations:


	Manage end-to-end accounting including AR, AP, GL, and reconciliations
	Prepare monthly management accounts and financial reports
	Monitor cash flow, bank balances, and payment schedules


Compliance & Controls:


	Ensure statutory compliance (taxes, filings, audits)
	Maintain strong internal controls and documentation
	Support external audits and regulatory reviews


Reporting & Insight:


	Track expenses, revenues, and cost allocations
	Support budgeting and forecast processes
	Provide clear financial insight to management


Systems & Discipline:


	Maintain accurate records within accounting systems
	Ensure data integrity and timely financial close


Skills & Experience


	5–8 years of accounting experience
	ACA or ACCA qualification (required or near completion)
	Experience operating as a sole accountant
	Infrastructure, telecom, or asset-heavy environment experience preferred


Cultural Markers:


	Detail-oriented, disciplined, and accountable
	Comfortable owning the full finance function
	Calm under reporting deadlines

Head of Operations Job at WATT Renewable Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        WATT Renewable Corporation - With headquarters in Alberta Canada, WATT is a private independent producer of clean energy technology. WATT delivers sustainable energy solutions utilizing an innovative mix of PV, advanced energy storage technology and genset. We provide a turnkey EPC and O&M services to our clients globally.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of Operations

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-Time

About the Job
     

            
    




	We’re looking for a results-driven Head of Operations to provide strategic and hands-on leadership across our energy generation and service delivery operations—covering diesel, solar, and hybrid assets—with a strong focus on reliability, safety, efficiency, and profitability.


What you’ll deliver


	Improved uptime and reliability across all sites
	Reduced operational cost per site through stronger controls and optimization
	Embedded HSE/quality compliance with measurable adherence
	Predictable incident response and reporting discipline
	Operational readiness to support expansion and new asset commissioning
	Head of Operations - WRNL


Key Responsibilities


	Lead end-to-end operations across diesel and renewable/hybrid assets
	Provide hands-on leadership to Operations, NOC, Maintenance, and Field teams
	Define KPIs, performance standards, and reporting cadence
	Drive continuous improvement (uptime, cost, response time, fuel discipline)
	Manage vendors, SLAs, and operational budgets; hold third parties accountable
	Support commissioning and operational handover for new assets
	Head of Operations - WRNL


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering/Operations (or related field)
	8–12 years of operational leadership experience in energy/power/infrastructure
	Strong diesel operations leadership experience
	Added advantage: experience in solar/hybrid systems
	Calm under pressure, safety-first, systems-minded, accountable leadership style
